name: Exorcise
description:
Keep dribbling the demon ball WASD to move. Left Click to dribble the ball. If the ball is charged, you can aim at enemies with your Right Click and shoot with your Left Click.

Exorcise is a fast-paced arcade shooter where you must defeat demons using the power of a basketball. Don't stop dribbling.

It features

  • An Online Leaderboard
  • 11 Different Color Palettes
  • Two tense, fast-paced songs
  • Bunch of different customizations
  • One enemy (Canonically named José)
  • A basketball that glows and gets all funky
Exorcise was made in 4 days for the This is: Argentina Jam 2022. Right now, the voting period is still on (You can rate it if you enjoyed it!) but once it ends I'll be updating it with new features

Programming, 3D Modelling, and Game Design by Luka Rizzi.

Audio and Music Design by Rafael Di Carlo.

Thanks Totally for helping with playtesting and recording gifs.

The Player Controller is a modified version of Dani's. The shader is a modified version of rogueNoodle's. The Font used is Retro-Edge.
